scripts.title: TCP4-2331 Verify Script API and Image 70
scripts.description: TCP4-2331 Verify Script API and Image
scripts.code:
<?php 
    // input array
    $state = array("AS"=>"ASSAM", "OR"=>"ORRISA", "KR"=>"KERELA");
      
    extract($state);
      
    // after using extract() function
$text = "$AS is $AS $KR is $KR $OR is $OR";
$array_implode = ["Israel", "Japan", "Germany"];
$array_text_implode = implode(" ", $array_implode);
$file = "http://www.filosofia.uchile.cl/.imaging/default/dam/imagenes/Filosofia/imagenes-pregrado/Licenciatura-en-Filosofia.png/jcr:content.png";
return ['text'=> $text, 'text_imploded'=> $array_text_implode, 'file' => $file];     
?>
